pageTitle: Shakebar Colour Protect Shampoo and Conditioner set

startup.startupPopText: After the termination of a contract with a major retail chain in South Africa, we are forced to liquidate our inventory.
startup.startupPopTextSecondPart: This week, take advantage of an 90% discount on the Shakebar Colour Protect Shampoo and Conditioner set!

header.shippingText: Free shipping until the end of the week!

productFeatures: Shakebar Colour Protect Shampoo and Conditioner are specially formulated to protect color-treated hair from fading.
Infused with Argan oil, Quinoa, and Rose oil to keep hair moisturized and vibrant.
Provides antioxidants to protect against damage from coloring and bleaching while enhancing shine and radiance.
productSection.productBenef: For a cleaner and greener South Africa!
productSection.productAvailabillity: In stock. Estimated delivery in 3 to 4 working days.

descriptionTexts: Colour Protect Shampoo is formulated for colour treated hair protect against fade. Blended with Argan oil, Quinoa and Rose oil to keep hair moisturized, the antioxidants to help protect hair against the stress of colouring and bleaching. Gentle yet effectively cleans from root to tip, enhances colour vribrancy, radiance and glossy shine.

Colour Protect Conditioner is formulated for colour treated hair protect against fade. Blended with Argan oil, Quinoa and Rose oil to keep hair moisturized, the antioxidants to help protect hair against the stress of colouring and bleaching. Detangles and softens so hair is easy to comb through, enhances colour vibrancy, radiance and glossy shine.
description.descriptionTextMain: Red Bull Energy Drink vitalizes body and mind. Red Bull Energy Drink is a functional beverage providing wings whenever you need them and is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, students, and in highly demanding professions as well as during long drives. Red Bull Energy Drinks contains the following high-quality ingredients: Caffeine, taurine, B-group vitamins, sugars, and alpine spring water Did you know: One 250ml can of Red Bull Energy Drink contains 80mg of caffeine, about the same amount as in a cup of coffee Red Bull Energy Drink is a functional beverage providing wiiings whenever you need them!
